org.xchain

Class AttributeDetail

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.AttributeDetail

  • public class AttributeDetail
extends java.lang.Object
    Detailed information for a command attribute. The attribute details for an instance of a command are available from the EngineeredCommand interface.
    Author:
    Christian Trimble
    See Also:
    EngineeredCommand.getAttributeDetailMap()

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AttributeDetail(javax.xml.namespace.QName qName, AttributeType type, java.lang.Class javaType, boolean required)
      Creates a new attribute detail object with the specified values.

      Returns the QName of the attribute.
      boolean getRequired()
      Returns true, if this attribute is required, false otherwise.

      • AttributeDetail

        public AttributeDetail(javax.xml.namespace.QName qName,
               AttributeType type,
               java.lang.Class javaType,
               boolean required)
        Creates a new attribute detail object with the specified values.
        Parameters:
        qName - the name of the attribute.
        type - the type of expression that this attribute's value represents.
        javaType - the java type that results from evaluating the attribute's value.
        required - true if the attribute is required, false otherwise.
